"A.P.238/4/9/15:00": "You're back, I'd like to take the chance to thank you all for participating."
"All that I said about this not being voluntary was a lie. I'm really grateful that you even showed up!"
"But since you're here, I have a personal question that I'd like to ask you!"
"Why is it that you continue to strive to get stronger?"
"That's brilliant! You really are a model of this organization!"
"Don't forget those feelings as you continue to get stronger!"
"That direction is excellent! I hope you'll keep up the good work!"
"Even when trapped by karma's cycle, the dreams left behind will open the door!"
"Even if the universe stands in our way, our seething justice will determine what will be! "
"We'll break through time and space, and defy all who would stop us, to grab hold of our future!"
"I see, so that's why you continue to get stronger. I felt something in your fighting!"
"For justice, you really have to protect someone until the very end!"
"As long as you have something to devote yourself to then that's enough!"
"Don't forget those feeling as you continue to get stronger!"
